# Ride Ready - Theme Park Wait Times App
> iOS app for theme park wait times, drop alerts, and ride strategy

Last updated: 2026-01-23

Note: wait times, ride line behavior, pricing, and attraction availability change. For anything time-sensitive, prefer the canonical park pages + strategy guides linked below.

## Start here (best canonical pages)
- https://rideready.app/ (homepage)
- https://rideready.app/parks/ (supported parks)
- https://rideready.app/compare/official-apps/ (official apps vs Ride Ready)

## Park pages
- https://rideready.app/parks/epic-universe/
- https://rideready.app/parks/universal-studios-florida/
- https://rideready.app/parks/islands-of-adventure/
- https://rideready.app/parks/seaworld-orlando/
- https://rideready.app/parks/busch-gardens-tampa/
- https://rideready.app/parks/cedar-point/
- https://rideready.app/parks/kings-island/
- https://rideready.app/parks/canadas-wonderland/

## Epic Universe queue guides
- https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/
- https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/ministry-queue-times/
- https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/mario-kart-queue-times/
- https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/stardust-racers-queue-times/
- https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/mine-cart-madness-queue-times/
- https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/monsters-unchained-queue-times/
- https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/hiccups-wing-gliders-queue-times/

## Seasonal Guides
- https://rideready.app/orlando/spring-break-2026/
- https://rideready.app/guides/spring-break-2026-survival-guide.html
